data.title: The Fabula Nova Crystallis Series on PlayStation
data.meta_description: The Fabula Nova Crystallis Series consists of 6 games containing 272 trophies worth a total of 8,205 Trophy XP. View your total score for the series here
data.text:
Check out these PS5 and PS4 games in the August Savings PS Store sale (UK, EU)

Discounts on Okami HD, Knack, LEGO Marvel Super Heroes, Final Fantasy X HD Remaster, Outlast, Rayman Legends, Nobunaga's Ambition Sphere of Influence, and more.

Posted just now by Jack Watling

Come grab some bargains in the Summer Game Fest PS Store sale (EU, UK)

Discounts on Need for Speed Rivals, Battlefield 4, Putty Squad, Ys: Memories of Celceta, Final Fantasy X HD Remaster, Strider, Mercenary Kings and more

Posted 2 months ago by Jack Watling

Check out these cheap games in the Summer Game Fest PS Store Sale (NA)

Discounts on Need for Speed Rivals, Battlefield 4, Putty Squad, flOw, Final Fantasy X HD Remaster, Final Fantasy X-2 HD Remaster, Strider, and more.

Posted 2 months ago by Jack Watling

Avoid 34 broken trophy lists in the Big Games Big Deals PS Store sale

Be wary of these unobtainable platinum trophies in the Big Games Big Deals PS Store sale of 2024. There are 34 broken trophy lists you'll want to avoid!

Posted 3 months ago by Sean Lawson

PS Plus leaving games May 2024 — how hard are the trophy lists?

There are a lot of PS Plus Extra and Premium leaving trophies in May 2024 — use this guide to see how hard the games are and if the platinums are obtainable.

Posted 4 months ago by Sean Lawson

PS Plus Extra losing 26 more games in May 2024 including Final Fantasy

The mighty list of PS Plus leaving games for May 2024 has been revealed. There are 26 leaving across PS5 and PS4 including eight Final Fantasy entries!

Posted 4 months ago by Kes Eylers-Stephenson

Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth delivers on Final Fantasy 15's potential

It has taken Square Enix until the launch of Final Fantasy VII Rebirth for a bunch of Final Fantasy XV's more ambitious ideas to finally get done right.

Posted 4 months ago by Lee Brady

Check out the PS5 deals in the Essential Picks PS Store sale (EU, UK)

Discounts on Hotline Miami, Need for Speed Rivals, Final Fantasy X HD Remaster, Rayman Legends, Metal Gear Solid V: Ground Zeroes, LEGO The Hobbit, and more.

Posted 5 months ago by Jack Watling
